Package jeudeloie

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cell
    Cell is the interface representing a cell on the board of the game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board is the class which represents the game's board.
    Dice
    Dice is a class which only statically throw dices.
    Game
    Game is the class which contains all the core rules of the game.
    GooseCell
    GooseCell is a special cell doubling the dice score.
    NormalBoard
    NormalBoard implements the abstract class Board.
    NormalCell
    NormalCell implements the interface Cell, and is used as a regular cell and also as a base to modify for the special cells.
    Player
    Player represents the player of the game.
    StartCell
    Implements Cell, and holds multiple players.
    TeleportCell
    TeleportCell is a special cell teleporting to a specified cell.
    TrapCell
    TrapCell is a special cell where you can't escape.
    WaitCell
    WaitCell is a special cell making the player wait for a determined amount of turns.
